title: Pizhūhish va BarnāmahʹRīzī-i Rūstāyī
aka: Journal of Research and Rural Planning
additional-note: This is an Iranian publication. As of when this entry was last updated, the United States has no copyright relations with Iran, so publications originating there do not have copyright protection in the US. The US copyright status of this journal may change if they establish copyright relations with the US, either directly or via treaties like the Berne Convention.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
